ai-ja333:1.3_0: It is for one who is attached to the highest banner,
ai-ja333:2.2_0: She should do her duty to one doing his duty,
ai-ja333:2.3_0: (But) she need not do good to one wishing her harm,
ai-ja333:2.4_0: No one need love those who do not love (in return).
ai-ja333:3.1_0: would not do what should be done,
ai-ja333:3.2_0: She need not love the one who is devoid of thought.
ai-ja333:3.3_0: Knowing that a bird was poor,
ai-ja333:3.4_0: Can seek out another (tree) in this great wide world.”
ai-ja333:4.1_0: “I’ll make sure that one, making this statement,
ai-ja333:4.2_0: he saw the aristocrat vassals who were speaking,
ai-ja333:4.4_0: You should give him a residence.”
ai-ja333:5.1_0: The third cowherd’s banner is finished.
